post.title: 積分 t=tan(x/2) 置換
post.content:
t=tan⁡(x2)t=\tan(\frac{x}{2})t=tan(2x​)の置換

最終形

∫f(sin⁡x,cos⁡x)dx=∫f(2t1+t2,1−t21+t2)21+t2dt\int f(\sin x, \cos x)dx = \int f(\frac{2t}{1+t^2}, \frac{1-t^2}{1+t^2})\frac{2}{1+t^2}dt∫f(sinx,cosx)dx=∫f(1+t22t​,1+t21−t2​)1+t22​dt

導出

t=tan⁡x2t = \tan \frac{x}{2}t=tan2x​ とすると、

(tan⁡x)′=(sin⁡xcos⁡x)′=1cos⁡2x\begin{aligned} (\tan x)' & = & (\frac{\sin x}{\cos x})' \\ & = & \frac{1}{\cos^2 x} \end{aligned}(tanx)′​==​(cosxsinx​)′cos2x1​​

より、

dtdx=12⋅1cos⁡2x2=1+tan⁡2x22=1+t22\begin{aligned} \frac{dt}{dx} &=& \frac{1}{2}\cdot \frac{1}{\cos^2 \frac{x}{2}} \\ &=& \frac{1+\tan^2\frac{x}{2}}{2} \\ &=& \frac{1 + t^2}{2} \end{aligned}dxdt​​===​21​⋅cos22x​1​21+tan22x​​21+t2​​

よって、

dx=21+t2dt(1)dx = \frac{2}{1+t^2}dt \tag{1}dx=1+t22​dt(1)

sin⁡x\sin xsinx を ttt で表す

sin⁡x=2cos⁡x2sin⁡x2=2tan⁡x2⋅cos⁡2x2=2tt2+1(2)\begin{aligned} \sin x &=& 2\cos\frac{x}{2}\sin\frac{x}{2} \\ &=& 2\tan\frac{x}{2}\cdot\cos^2\frac{x}{2} \\ &=& \frac{2t}{t^2 + 1} \tag{2} \end{aligned}sinx​===​2cos2x​sin2x​2tan2x​⋅cos22x​t2+12t​​(2)

cos⁡x\cos xcosx を ttt で表す

cos⁡x=2cos⁡2x2−1=21+t2−1=−t2+1t2+1(3)\begin{aligned} \cos x &=& 2\cos^2\frac{x}{2} - 1 \\ &=& \frac{2}{1+t^2} - 1 \\ &=& \frac{-t^2+1}{t^2+1} \tag{3} \end{aligned}cosx​===​2cos22x​−11+t22​−1t2+1−t2+1​​(3)

(1),(2),(3)(1),(2),(3)(1),(2),(3) より

∫f(sin⁡x,cos⁡x)dx=∫f(2t1+t2,1−t21+t2)21+t2dt\int f(\sin x, \cos x)dx = \int f(\frac{2t}{1+t^2}, \frac{1-t^2}{1+t^2})\frac{2}{1+t^2}dt∫f(sinx,cosx)dx=∫f(1+t22t​,1+t21−t2​)1+t22​dt

が成り立つ。

計算用紙
